website_summaries.verdict: Beautiful and well-made with a classic design, feminine looks, and real 14 karat gold metal that is sure to grab attention and earn compliments.
pros: Distances itself from others with its authentic 14 karat gold craftsmanship with a weight of 2.6 grams
Beautiful mariner link with strong lobster claw clasp
Backed by a 30-day money back guarantee
cons: The priciest option on our list, but what you'd expect to pay for genuine 14 karat gold

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful anklet! Always skeptical to order good jewelry on ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful anklet! Always skeptical to order good jewelry on line, but this was better than expected. Artsy, shiny yet elegant. It's not too thin or too wide, just perfect! I would recommend and buy it again for family and friends. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Denisa B

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars is generous
customer_reviews.text: I like it, BUT the clasp started slipping and the bracelet would come off so I took to my local jewelry to repair and the cost will be $ 60-$65! I have worn it maybe 10 times! Disappointed Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Gold Chain.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It’s beautiful. It is very smooth and fits great. The hook is sturdy and well closed. I’d recommend it for great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie41855

customer_reviews.title: What I like most the anklet is solid it look good on ...
customer_reviews.text: What I like most the anklet is solid it look good on just wish it was a little bigger.The price was very good.I would buy again .
customer_reviews.author: Patricia e Brown

customer_reviews.title: This is beautiful, just need an extension
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful, just need an extension, a littl short. But beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: lil kim

customer_reviews.title: Pretty anklet
customer_reviews.text: nice anklet, lies flat against the ankle, only a little bit too long as it drops down over my heel and gets caught easily (I do have very small ankles)
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor M. W. Forbes

customer_reviews.title: Great ankle bracelet
customer_reviews.text: Although this was a beautiful ankle bracelet, it was not thick enough for what I needed. It was hard to tell that ordering online. I was very happy with the fast delivery and the return process was quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: SuperMom12

customer_reviews.title: Love this ankle bracelet
customer_reviews.text: Got this ankle bracelet for my daughter’s birthday...she’s very picky but loved it. Good quality and is exactly what was advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Madonna B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful ankle bracelet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ankle bracelet for my adult daughter’s birthday and she loved it! It’s made well and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant experience.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a lovely anklet for the money, however I need an anklet that is heavier. Bob was very kind and helpful on the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: i LOVED IT BUT IT ONLY LASTED ONE YEAR
customer_reviews.text: IT LASTED ONE YEAR AND BROKE... I AM SO SAD
customer_reviews.author: valerie magnaghi

customer_reviews.title: Way too big for most women!!
customer_reviews.text: As I said in the headline, this ankle bracelet is way too big for most women. It's 10 inches long and most women will find it down in their shoe, not riding up on their ankle. The links are also very thin and have sharp edges.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Dietsch

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Will not break.
customer_reviews.text: Very strong anklet. Had for a while and I never take it off. All others have broken. This is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Londonblue

customer_reviews.title: Small 14K anklet
customer_reviews.text: Very small & not like the picture I was disappointed but it is solid 14 karat gold
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Disalvo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. I get compliments overtime I wear it!
customer_reviews.author: L. George

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly happy with this item. Item was packaged nicely and the item is exactly as represented.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Cameron

customer_reviews.title: There is no headline for me to add.
customer_reviews.text: The product was ok. I thought the links were larger from looking at the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Coney-Salley

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy jewelry on line you don’t get what you think you will get
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like it the anklet was not the way it looked in picture much to thin to small
customer_reviews.author: Fannie Mabry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful anklet...exactly as hoped and expected. also the customer service person was available and very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very small and thin doesn't look like the size on the pic but was real
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect width
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid it was going to be too thin, but it is just right. Loved it!
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Nice Piece!
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece, just wish it was a tad bit thicker. The seller is great very understanding and delivery was super fast. Definitely recommend !
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Way smaller than described and expected which made it look ...
customer_reviews.text: Way smaller than described and expected which made it look cheap, the picture is a lot nicer than the actual item...
customer_reviews.author: VIDYA TEELUCKSINGH

customer_reviews.title: Excellet and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My ankle bracelet I had kept breaking and my husband said - why don't you just get another one as it costs you every time you have the old one soldered at the jeweller - so I did! I ordered this one and it is beautiful. I am very pleased with the quality and it fit perfectly. The lobster claw clasp adds to the strength of the anklet. I am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Delhenty

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday wear!!
customer_reviews.text: Lays perfectly! I am not easy on jewelry and it has lasted
customer_reviews.author: Jill Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love my ankle bracelet
customer_reviews.text: Ankle bracelet. Looks very nice 🤗very dainty and feminine 💝
customer_reviews.author: Elba  Nydia Lozada

customer_reviews.title: Very good deal
customer_reviews.text: The item is very nice and was a great deal.it arrived on time as promised
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Wells

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: I love my anklet!! It is the perfect size for my ankle. Not too thin and not too thick! It looks so good on!! Totally recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Mar-Gerie Crawley

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The anklet is ok. I thought it would be a little heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect and its pretty solid. Nice and sturdy clasp
customer_reviews.author: melani reith

customer_reviews.title: It is absolutely beautifully desinged and visible on my ankle
customer_reviews.text: It is absolutely beautifully desinged and visible on my ankle. I'm so glad that I purchased it to replace my lost one. Better price than the mall jewlers and better looking.
customer_reviews.author: LAJ

customer_reviews.title: smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: suggest buying jewelry local so you can see what you are getting
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: beautiful gold anklet!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it! Very happy with quality and am glad that I bought it for her!
customer_reviews.author: Steve LePage

customer_reviews.title: She loved the box it came in too
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mother. She loves, loves, loves it. It matches her arm bracelet to a tee. She loved the box it came in too!!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed. I orddered the 14K solid gold mariner 10" ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed. I orddered the 14K solid gold mariner 10" anklet and instead received a figaro 8" bracelet that doesn't even fit my wrist.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smaller in actuality than they made it appear but lovely none the less!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice anklet
customer_reviews.text: it's a nice anklet though I thought it would be thicker. I used to have a panther cut and loved it and was hoping to find something similarly cut.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I likw the item it was the same as advertise.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Product to thin looked thicker in the picture on amazon website

customer_reviews.title: I'm a Fan!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, excellent purchase experience!! I'm an immediate fan of JewelStop!
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it , fits , came in pretty box and especially had claw clasp
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend it to others
customer_reviews.text: Lovely anklet. Its more durable than other anklets. Would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Terrie Cannon

customer_reviews.title: This is a very dainty anklet.
customer_reviews.text: This was very pretty but disappointed in the thickness for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Lee Lonnevik

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable anklet.
customer_reviews.text: I should have paid attention to the grams. It is a bit thinner than I expected. That is my own fault. The piece is nice, and has stretched out so that I don't even know it is there.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Benton

product_meta.title: 14k Solid Yellow Gold 3.2 mm Mariner Anklet, Lobster Claw Clasp, 10 Inches, 2.6gr.
product_meta.description:
Style is something each of us have, the only thing required is to find it. But, in this case you need not go and search for the perfect style. Instead, we are here at your service with the largest online jewelry store right at your door step. JewelStop presents you a mariner chain anklet with a lobster claw clasp that is simply adorable, and is available at a really affordable price. Moreover, the stunning design would make you fall in love with it, plus would make you want to wear it all the time. The ankle bracelet is crafted in 14k gold properly stamped and marked. The gold anklet is yellow gold in color and has a high polished finish. The 14k gold anklet has been designed in a way that makes it look simply ravishing. It also has a lobster claw attached to it and is 10" long. The ankle bracelet is of a high quality and comes with 30 days money back. The package includes a jewelry box as well (domestic shipments only). So, hurry up and buy this amazing anklet at an equally amazing price. Please note that images have been enlarged to show better detail.

 * Product Dimensions :5.2 x 4 x 1.3 inches; 0.32 Ounces
